job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Senior Engineer and Tech Lead at TKH AI, you will play a key role in executing our AI product strategy. Your primary responsibility will be to guide the development of our Conversational AI foundation, integrating it across various tools and platforms (such as communication systems and IDEs). You will also drive the development of AI-driven Proofs of Concept (POCs) tailored to the needs of our group of companies.

   You will collaborate closely with product management, design, and other stakeholders to develop innovative and effective software solutions. Your role will include fostering a culture of technical excellence, continuous improvement, and customer-focused innovation.

   Key Responsibilities:
     * Provide technical direction and leadership to developers and AI engineers.

     * Drive architecture and design of scalable and maintainable AI solutions.

     * Ensure code quality and reduce technical debt.

     * Work closely with product managers to translate business goals into technical requirements.

     * Facilitate communication between development team and stakeholders.

     * Mentor and coach team members, providing regular feedback.

     * Oversee development lifecycle, from planning to deployment and maintenance.

     * Ensure timely delivery of high-quality software solutions.

   Encourage a culture of experimentation and learning.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer

As a Senior Engineer and Tech Lead at TKH AI, you will play a key role in executing our AI product strategy. Your primary responsibility will be to guide the development of our Conversational AI foundation, integrating it across various tools and platforms (such as communication systems and IDEs). You will also drive the development of AI-driven Proofs of Concept (POCs) tailored to the needs of our group of companies.

   You will collaborate closely with product management, design, and other stakeholders to develop innovative and effective software solutions. Your role will include fostering a culture of technical excellence, continuous improvement, and customer-focused innovation.

   Key Responsibilities:
     * Provide technical direction and leadership to developers and AI engineers.

     * Drive architecture and design of scalable and maintainable AI solutions.

     * Ensure code quality and reduce technical debt.

     * Work closely with product managers to translate business goals into technical requirements.

     * Facilitate communication between development team and stakeholders.

     * Mentor and coach team members, providing regular feedback.

     * Oversee development lifecycle, from planning to deployment and maintenance.

     * Ensure timely delivery of high-quality software solutions.

   Encourage a culture of experimentation and learning.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on software engineering leadership, architecture, and general AI product strategy without specifying the use of generative models, LLMs, or related advanced AI techniques. While it mentions 'AI product strategy' and 'AI solutions', it lacks the specific details required to classify it as a GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer. The emphasis is on general software development and leadership within an AI context, rather than specialized AI model development or deployment.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'translate business goals into technical requirements' directly indicates understanding and aligning technical work with business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: translate business goals into technical requirements

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'guide the development of our Conversational AI foundation, integrating it across various tools and platforms' and 'drive the development of AI-driven Proofs of Concept (POCs)', which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: guide the development of our Conversational AI foundation, integrating it across various tools and platforms

job_tasks.justification: The responsibility to 'drive the development of AI-driven Proofs of Concept (POCs)' falls under software development, specifically in creating initial versions of AI solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: drive the development of AI-driven Proofs of Concept (POCs)

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'drive architecture and design of scalable and maintainable AI solutions' is a key aspect of software development, focusing on the structural integrity and long-term viability of systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive architecture and design of scalable and maintainable AI solutions

job_tasks.justification: Ensuring 'code quality and reduce technical debt' are fundamental software development practices aimed at maintaining a healthy codebase.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure code quality and reduce technical debt

job_tasks.justification: Overseeing the 'development lifecycle, from planning to deployment and maintenance' encompasses the operational aspects of software and AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Oversee development lifecycle, from planning to deployment and maintenance

job_tasks.justification: Ensuring 'timely delivery of high-quality software solutions' relates to the operational efficiency and reliability of the development process.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure timely delivery of high-quality software solutions

fostering a culture of technical excellence, continuous improvement, and customer-focused innovation
